metadata.title: CVE-2018-19199 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in uriparser before 0.9.0. UriQuery.c allows aninteger overflow via a uriComposeQuery* or uriComposeQueryEx* functionbecause of an unchecked multiplication.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19199` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liburiparser1 - 0.9.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: uriparser package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.3-2').
